properties.entry: UPDATE MEMBER SET LOCATION_NO = ? , MEMBER_ID = ? , MEMBER_NAME = ? , MEMBER_ALIAS = ? , EMAIL = ? , GENDER = ? , AGE = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NO , LOCATION_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ALIAS , EMAIL , GENDER , AGE , ENROLL_DATE , REPORT_COUNT , STATUS , PF_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ?
